BasicInfo.short: Designation Hub provides online real estate designations, tools and script workouts to real estate agents and assistants.

Products.name: CREN | CERTIFIED REAL ESTATE NEGOTIATOR DESIGNATION
Products.description: Become an expert negotiator through our Certified Real Estate Negotiator Designation.

Products.name: CFTHBS | Certified First Time Homebuyer Designation
Products.description: CFTHBS is an real estate that helps agents specialize when it comes to dealing with first-time home-buyers.

Products.name: ARPM | Accredited Property Management Designation
Products.description: Create a profitable cash flow for yourself or for your clients by becoming an Accredited Residential Property Manager.
